intro: Hey, I'm Jae. I've graduated from the University of British Columbia with a Computer Science degree back in 2020, and since then, I've been working as a software developer.
description1: This is my personal space on the internet dedicated to showcasing my writing, various projects, tutorials, and any other content I'm passionate about sharing. Dive into the blog or check out the projects page for a glimpse of my work.
description2: Currently, I am living in South Korea working at E8ight as a frontend developer, located at Lotte World Tower, the sixth-tallest building in the world.
